name: You Chose This
description:
You Chose This is a minimalistic game  experimenting with the genre combination of interactive storytelling and precision platforming. Developed with the ideology of having a story you can replay and dissect, and controls that are a joy to use, You Chose This will leave you thinking about it for days.

In the game, you are a playtester for a new platformer game, but as time goes on you realise the developer may not be all that she seems.

Developed for Computer Gaming Technology at Anglia Ruskin University.
